config.better_hp.show_decimal_health: Show health as decimals or whole numbers
config.better_hp.show_numeric_hunger: Show numeric hunger instead of vanilla hunger bar
config.better_hp.show_oxygen_icon: Show custom oxygen icon when underwater
config.better_hp.show_numeric_health: Show numeric health instead of vanilla health bar
config.better_hp.show_numeric_oxygen: Show numeric oxygen value when underwater
config.better_hp.enable_dynamic_health_c: Enable dynamic health color change (Green -> Full, Yellow -> Low, Red -> Critical)
config.better_hp.health_display_x: Horizontal position of the health icon display
config.better_hp.health_display_y: Vertical position of the health icon display
config.better_hp.armor_display_x: Horizontal position of the armor icon display
config.better_hp.armor_display_y: Vertical position of the armor icon display
config.better_hp.hunger_display_x: Horizontal position of the hunger icon display
config.better_hp.hunger_display_y: Vertical position of the hunger icon display
config.better_hp.oxygen_display_x: Horizontal position of the oxygen icon display
config.better_hp.oxygen_display_y: Vertical position of the oxygen icon display
config.better_hp.health_color: Color of the health numerical value in the HUD (Decimal color code; Default is Red)
config.better_hp.healthTextOffset: Horizontal offset between the health icon and the numeric health text [Default: 15] [100+hp:Set -> 20 999+hp: set -> 25]
